meta.name: description
meta.expr:content: "Everything we posted in " + data:blog.pageName + " can be found on this page. Well, everything except expired events. Expired event listings are routinely purged from the archives."

meta.name: description
meta.expr:content: "A listing of all our posts tagged: " + data:blog.searchLabel

meta.name: description
meta.content: One of the few e/n blogs still around from the 90s. Major topics include anime, gaming, club photography and blogger development. Minor topics include Andy Rooney’s hoarding problem.

meta.name: description
meta.content: On One Piece everybody cries! Except for this time. Here we have Chief Warden Magellan taking a wicked shit without warning in front of Vice-WardenHannyabal Vice-Warden. See, Megallan’s devil fruit powers make him immune to poison. So he eats poisonous food to make him stronger–I think. But these poisonous foods give him crippling diarrhea. Read: he spends ten hours a day on the toilet!

a.onclick: window.open("http://www.blogger.com/follow-blog.g?blogID=4529442105479101205", "followblog", "height=600, width=600, toolbar=no, menubar=no, scrollbars=no, resizable=no, location=no, directories=no, status=no" );

div.p: Blogger's built-in search engine is pretty lousy. As far as we can tell only the most recent posts are cached. How lame is that? Not worries, just try your search again on Google. They have more of our pages indexed. If that doesn't work send us an email and we'll look into the matter.

p.a: » Search MY STADY for using Google.

div.p: Apparently the page you're looking for doesn't exist. Or maybe it once existed but has since ceased to be. Or maybe you typed some gibberish to see what happens, jerk! Anyhoo, we don't have any content filed under . You might have better luck searching for .

a.expr:title: "View all " + data:label.count + " posts filed under " + data:label.name

img.expr:title: "RSS feed for posts filed under " + data:label.name
